column1: * 1922 - J.R.R. Tolkien agrees to review Beowulf: An Introduction to the Study of the Poem.
* 1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien performs Wikipedia:Geoffrey Chaucers Wikipedia:The Reeves Tale at the Summer Diversions - a festival of recitals
* 1947 – Rayner Unwin reports on the first version of The Fellowship of the Ring.
* 1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mrs Dixey.
* 1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith (28 July 1955).
* 1967 - The Ballad of Bilbo Baggins is performed by Leonard Nimoy in the TV-show wikipedia:Malibu_U.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Campbell.
* 1989 - Mythcon 20 at wikipedia:University of British Columbia
* 1996 - Mythcon 27 at wikipedia:University of Colorado at Boulder in wikipedia:Boulder
* 2016 - Leaf by Niggle is published for the first time as a stand-alone volume.
